review: Because my son and I only have access to basic cable, I bought us each an Amazon Fire TV Stick for our separate TV's.  With our own wi-fi system the transformation of our television viewing has brought us shows and movies that we would never have had otherwise.  So much less expensive than adding the ultimate cable package and all in HD!  I plan on purchasing one for my best friend for her birthday in July!  Greatest thing ever!
author: Jan Tomlinson

review: AWFUL, I recommend you spend the extra money to buy the Fire TV box instead of the stick, had it just over a month before it started acting up. After an hour with customer service and deregistering and registering the device, it worked again- until the next day. Then every time I went to use it, I would spend an hour trying to get it to work. Tried to return it, amazon said it had been over a month since I purchased it and it couldn't be returned. I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS DEVICE. I have a Fire TV and have never had any problems with it, it is a better way to spend your money.
